articles.author: Jessica Golden
articles.title: PayPal teams up with the Big Ten and Big 12 to enable payments to student-athletes - CNBC
articles.description: A new partnership between the Big Ten and Big 12 conferences and PayPal will allow student-athletes to receive their compensation via the fintech company.
articles.content: Global payment company PayPal announced on Thursday that it has inked a deal with the Big Ten and Big 12 conferences to allow student-athletes to receive compensation through the fintech company's pl… [+1966 chars]
